alert.note: Alert for Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued May 18 at 3:52AM MDT until May 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Snowy Range, including Centennial, Albany, and Woods Landing. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Outdoor recreation could become life threatening to those caught unprepared for winter conditions. Hikers and snowmobilers may become disoriented. Frostbite and hypothermia can develop quickly.
